import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import getProductDetailData from '../Store/Action/GetProductDetailDataAction' import SellerProfile from './SellerProfile' import { endPoints } from '../API/Endpoint' import { Api } from '../API/Api' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'
Oppo Oppo Hot 11S ₹10,000.00 ₹11,000.00
const ProductDetail = (props) => { const { id } = useParams() const dispatch = useDispatch() const data = useSelector(state => state.ProductPageReducer?.ProductPageData) console.log(data) useEffect(() => { getProductDetailData(dispatch, id) }, [dispatch]) const reqpayload = { Authorization: 'Bearer ' + localStorage.getItem("logintoken") } console.log(reqpayload.Authorization) {/*useEffect(() => { Api.post(endPoints.GET_USER_ID_FROM_MYPROFILE,) })*/} return ( <> {data.map((item, index) => { return (<>
{item.brandData ? (
{item.brandData[0].name}
) : null}
{item.Title}

{item.Price.current_store_price.$numberDecimal} sell_price:{item.Price.sell_price.$numberDecimal}

{item.shippingCost ? item.shippingCost : "Free"} shipping

Item Detail

{item.brandData ? (

Brand :{item.brandData[0].name}

) : null} {item.Condition ?

Condition:{item.Condition}

: ""}

ShippingCost : {item.shippingCost ? item.shippingCost : "Free"}

{ item.Attrs.length > 0 ? item.Attrs.map((attrs, index) => { return (
{attrs.name ?

{attrs.name} : {attrs.value}

: ""}
) }) : null}
Description :

{item.categoryData ? Category :{item.categoryData[0].name} : null} {item.subcategoryData ?   {item.subcategoryData[0].name} : null}

{item.updatedAt ?

Posting:{item.updatedAt.split('T')[0]}

: null}
) }) } ) } export default ProductDetail;
